Summary: saw glowing white round object in night shy getting brite & dim while object was moving around in circles
divs: Sighting Detailswell it was monday nite july 2nd , i had just returned home from dropping off my girl friend at home, as far as the time i arrived at home had to be id say from about 10:30 to about 11:00 pm to the best of my knowledge, so, then i got out of my car when in my house to open door get in side to get what i needed cigerete get soda from in house then come back out side only after about 10 min had gone by since id gotton back, so i walked around the front of my trailor house put the radio on in my car listioned to radio got bored by it so i got out of my car i looked up the the left of the sky while i saw a bright round glowing object getting going from btite to dim off and on while the object unbelievable to my eyes it was about 12:00 clock high in the night sky moving around in a clock wise postion,while slowly it was moving it then moved to 6:00 oclock postion while moving around in circles at that postion,while the glow of object still intermitting glowing, then it moved to 9:00 clock postion still spining around clockwise then it spent a little time there moved next to the 3:00 clock postion in the sky then then continued with intermitting glowing getting brite to dim then disapeared in the sky i would say about 220 degrees south west i know the direction was right when i last saw it cuse my satalite dish is pointed to 220 degrees south west, also id like to point out here very important it was moving around in circles clockwise while traveling to the south west area in the night sky at same time i was so amazed to see this site when it was at 12:00 clock high it dropped stait down like a direct line from 12:00 postion to 6:00 oclock postion i was wow also there was no sound of the object so i got phone called 911 police came filled out report but object was gone before they arrived but i saw the object for good 30 min still im amazed what i saw also i i know all about UFOS so i knew what i saw was not an airplane was a real ufo space ship one last point it seemed maybe the flight patterns was due to maybe navigation problems or was having problems cuse it was moving around oddly as if it was having trouble on board or something , but i got the feeling what ever ufo piolet who was running ship i feel was maybe trying to send message with the cirlce flight patterns it was making in the sky, but yes this sighting of mine did happan ill never for get it cuse stars dont move but this UFO was awesome to see.
